sentence: Its one reason Trumps orbit and Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnells political operation have united behind former football star Herschel Walker in the Georgia Senate race: the likelihood of a close election in November against Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock.
title: Trump heads for big rebuke in Tuesdays elections

sentence: Republican Herschel Walker sailed to victory in Georgia's GOP Senate primary, setting up a matchup with incumbent Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock (D-Ga.).
author: Max Greenwood
title: Five takeaways from primaries in Georgia, Alabama and beyond
